page.title: 13RUISLIP/EASTCOTE SHOPPING
page.content: A survey of people that were shopping in Ruislip found that, 62% liked the centre. Only 27% of the shoppers lived near Ruislip. 51% had travelled by car 13% by bus 7% by bike and 29% walked. 83% used other centres regularly. On a survey ranking shops by their commoness,(eg newsagents scoring 1, furniture store scoring 10), Ruislip scored 407, Ruislip Gardens 306 and the corner shops at Howletts Lane, 11. In Eastcote the main road through the study area (Field End Road) is well served by a variety of shops, including a large number of fashion, hardware and gift shops but fewer food shops. There are many estate agents, travel agents,building societies and restaurants suggesting a high standard of living. Typical prices _ potatoes 9p/pound, strawberries 80p/pound, cornflakes 65p/500g.
